body_html: (For reference, tf.Variable was made to work in 9cc29a7 , which isn't included in the 1.10 release, and hence the notebook in the 1.10 release branch continues to use tfe.Variable - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.10/tensorflow/contrib/eager/python/examples/notebooks/custom_training.ipynb)
body_text: (For reference, tf.Variable was made to work in 9cc29a7 , which isn't included in the 1.10 release, and hence the notebook in the 1.10 release branch continues to use tfe.Variable - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.10/tensorflow/contrib/eager/python/examples/notebooks/custom_training.ipynb)
body: (For reference, `tf.Variable` was made to work in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/9cc29a75ce8131db67b48e92dac3c16a255b92ed , which isn't included in the 1.10 release, and hence the notebook in the 1.10 release branch continues to use `tfe.Variable` - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.10/tensorflow/contrib/eager/python/examples/notebooks/custom_training.ipynb)
